text:
January 24, 1952
Member of
NAEB Board and/or
NAEB Adult Education Committee
Dear Sir*
Here is a complete package of materials relating to the
Lowell-NAEB Adult Education Project, financed by the Fund for
Adult Education.
The various minutes, memos, program plans, and reports
are arranged more or less chronologically.
All future issues of such material will be distributed to
you for addition to this collection so that you may be fully
informed from start to finish; moreover, we will see to it that
all subsequent releases are carefully slugged as to subject
matter and date.
Program Coord inat/fr-
NAEB Adult Education Project
P.S. Not inoluded in this package is material relating to the
project which is included in minutes sent out from Champaign.
It is assumed you have copies, but for your references these are:
1. NAEB Board meeting. Sept. 14-15, 1951* A report on pro¬
gram series together with list of people consulted in their devel¬
opment •
2. Committee of Five meeting, Deo. 8, 9: Contains budget
and proposal for Washington "News" bureau.
3. Committee of Five meeting, Jan. 6,6, 1952: Contains
proposal for publicity and promotion campaign.
